reference.shortdesc: The topicsubject element identifies the subjects that are covered by a topic or map.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: To identify a primary subject, refer to the subject with the topicsubject element itself. Secondary subjects can be specified by nested subjectref elements.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The topicsubject element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the classification-domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , , keyref, keys, processing-role and toc.

For this element:
The processing-role attribute has a default value of resource-only.
The toc attribute has a default value of no.
